thread.title: Baltimore Police Were Told To Use Seatbelts For Years Before Freddie Gray Died
thread.title_full: Baltimore Police Were Told To Use Seatbelts For Years Before Freddie Gray Died - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Baltimore Police Were Told To Use Seatbelts For Years Before Freddie Gray Died
text: At the time of Freddie Gray's death last spring, the Baltimore Police Department had been waging a nearly three-year campaign urging officers to use seat belts for detainees transported in police vans, newly obtained documents show. -- This feed and its contents are the property of The Huffington Post, and use is subject to our terms. It may be used for personal consumption, but may not be distributed on a website. ...
